text: Fabián Ernesto Alarcón Rivera (born April 14, 1947) was President of Ecuador from 6 February 1997 to 9 February 1997 and from February 11, 1997 to August 10, 1998. Alarcón was born in Quito. He was head of the Congress from 1991 to 1992 and then again from August 1995 to February 1997, when he was made acting president due to the impeachment of President Abdalá Bucaram. ==Other websites== * Official Website of the Ecuadorian Government about the country President's History Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Ecuador Category:Politicians from Quito
title: Fabián Alarcón
